headline: IDEXX Laboratories, Inc. (IDXX): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on IDEXX Laboratories, Inc. (IDXX) on Substack by Hidden Market Gems. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on IDXX. IDEXX Laboratories, Inc. (IDXX)’s share was trading at $426.69 as of March 11th. IDXX’s trailing and forward P/E were 39.98 and 36.36 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. IDEXX Laboratories, […]

headline: Corporate Buyers Sign Deals with Texas Solar Energy Projects
summary: Technology company Cisco is among the groups involved in six virtual power purchase agreements (VPPAs) to secure energy from two solar power plants being developed in Texas.
